r.d: DBA is a wrapper for the php DBA functions. It includes a file-based emulator and provides a uniform, object-based interface for the Berkeley-style database systems.
r.n:
* Errors now return error codes in addition to messages. Thanks to Olaf Conradi for the working on this. * Minor updates to code comments
Next release will be 1.0 stable, barring any show stoppers.
